{{title|operator{{==}}{{dsc small|(std::layout_right::mapping)}}}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/layout_right/mapping/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|1=
template&lt; class OtherExtents &gt;
friend constexpr bool operator==( const mapping&amp; lhs, 
                                  const mapping&lt;OtherExtents&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}
Compares two layout mappings of the same layout type based on their underlying extents. 

Layout mappings {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} compare equal if both {{c|lhs.extents()}} and {{c|rhs.extents()}} are equal.

{{cpp/enable_if|{{c|1=extents_type::rank() == OtherExtents::rank()}} is {{c|true}}.}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|layout mappings whose extents to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|1=lhs.extents() == rhs.extents()}} is {{c|true}}, {{c|false}} otherwise
